title: Interview With President Trump (Ep 1241)
description:
In this episode I interview President Donald J. Trump. 
I also discuss the troubling new revelations in the witch hunt of General Mike Flynn. 

News Picks:


Joe Biden breaks his silence on the Tara Reade allegations.

Tesla’s Elon Musk unloads on the lockdowns. 


More bombshells in the Flynn witch hunt. The FBI found no derogatory information on Flynn but targeted him anyway. 

I wish liberals understood how dangerous a place they’re taking us. 


The NY Times shuts down the Biden campaign’s fake talking points.

Colleges and Universities will have to re-evaluate their business models due to the Wuhan Virus. 

These New Yorkers are fleeing the city and vowing to never return.
